channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
Ok my servers going really good after i released(made it public) but people r telling me that certain places r pk, which shuldnt be, theres been alot of topics about making places non pk but i still dont understand, i want to make my rune crafting place non pk and also i wanna make it so when u die in duel arena u dont loose all ur items u only loose the 1s u staked...becuz right now in duel arena when u die u lose everything. please help me out and tell me exactly what to put, thanks
old_nite
